MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:53am following reports of a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55am on the 27th of March 2021.
